answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Wayne - Concord and Sunnyvale, CA and Bellevue WA all have goals, objectives and performance indicators for every department including Code enforcement.  Might be worth a call to each?
Good luck,
Pam Muse

author: Wayne Wright
text: Does anyone know of a rating system for objecitvelly assessing the effectiveness of code enforcement in a community?  I'm looking for something similar to Keep America Beautiful's litter index.
title: Community appearance ratings
